R0002.title: Coupon Enumeration
R0002.definition: Bulk enumeration of coupon codes, redemption codes, discount codes, and other promotional voucher credentials.
R0002.description: Voucher numbers are generated by some rule-based sequence or guessable algorithm. Through brute-force enumeration or algorithm cracking, voucher numbers can be obtained in bulk for further exploitation.
R0002.influence: Exploits platform promotional benefits and occupies resources intended for legitimate users.

references.title: OWASP Automated Threat: OAT002 Token Cracking
